input-field.name: cacheDuration
input-field.label: Cache Duration
input-field.helpText: How long should Shopware cache prices before hitting the API?

input-field.name: forceOffCanvasRecalculate
input-field.label: Force Off-Canvas Cart Recalculation
input-field.helpText: Should prices always be pulled from the API when the off-canvas cart is opened? (This will reduce performance)

input-field.name: forceCartPreviewRecalculate
input-field.label: Force Cart Preview Recalculation
input-field.helpText: Should prices always be pulled from the API when the cart preview is loaded [URL: /checkout/cart]? (Recommended true, though will reduce performance)

input-field.name: forceCheckoutConfirmRecalculate
input-field.label: Force Checkout Confirm Cart Recalculation
input-field.helpText: Should prices always be pulled from the API when at the final step of checkout [URL: /checkout/confirm]? (Recommended true, though will reduce performance)
